original_title: Поди туда – не знаю куда, найди то – не знаю что
overview: 10 June 2013 with a budget of 100 rubles a day, hoping to hitchhike, I went from Obninsk Russia to the east. The ultimate goal was Vladivostok. Had to overcome a distance of 9200 km. During the time I was not restricted. With people, you see, I spent a few hours with someone a few days, but none of them I did not know until this trip
tagline: «No war. No policy. Only art, peace & love»
title: Go there — I don't know where, find something — I don't know what
